game.title: The Lost City of Eldarath
game.description: Legends speak of the ancient city of Eldarath, hidden deep within the mystical forest. Brave adventurers are sought to uncover its secrets and retrieve a powerful artifact.
game.objective: Retrieve the Star Crystal from the Lost City of Eldarath

tasks.description: Gather information about the location of Eldarath from local villagers and travelers.
Venture into the mystical forest and navigate through its treacherous paths to reach the entrance of Eldarath.
Explore the ancient city, avoid deadly traps, and solve puzzles to retrieve the Star Crystal.
